name: Dashing Mariachis
description:
Dashing Mariachis is a Mexican culture inspired game, situated in early 20th century and heavily relying in Mariachi music with a subtle 8bit treatment, puts the player inside a 3D side-scrolling runner adventure with a gameplay shift at the ending of every stage where now the player has to hit musical notes accordingly in order to keep the Serenata (musical performance) running.

Avoid all obstacles to finally reach an old pueblo where someone awaits for your Serenata!

- Run through deserts and mountains in a platform runner game mode!
- Play music and deliver a joyful Serenata in a rhythm game mode!

Play as:
- Tito: Guitar
- Enrico: Guitarron
- Pedro: Violin
- Juanito: Trumpet

The player can choose between Tito (guitar), Pedro (violin), Juanito (trumpet) and Enrico (guitarron). These four mariachis feature different main tracks during the rhythm phase depending on their instruments.

Gains coins and hire Mariachis, buy skins and get new instruments for each Mariachi. Dashing Mariachis lets you play in your own style!
